Articles.Content: I am using Wings3d, and my model is complete. But i have a problem. I have run out of UV "colors". There are 8 different colors, but my model is too complex.  Help?

Just use Blender. Much better and without silly nonsensical "colour limits". If you can save that current model as an FBX and then import it to Blender once you have it and learn how to UV there, which should be MUCH BETTER.
